1.0.name: wordpress/scroll-to-top-plugin
1.0.description:
Scroll to top plugin will add a button that hovers in the bottom right corner of your screen that allow users to smoothly scroll up.

This plugin will make your job to integrate jQuery Scroll to Top Control in wordpress more very easy.

Features :

  • Easy to use
  • Panel option, to customize:
    • Image button
    • Scroll speed
    • The button appears
  • Compatible in wordpress
  • Run smoothly for all browser

For more detail see the release page : Scroll to Top Plugin

Demo

Please check our homepage then scroll the page down (at least 350 pixels) to see a "Scroll to Top" control appear at the lower right of the window.
